body:
## Expected Behavior

Password should be obfuscated rather than being displayed in plain text. Alternatively if log statement could be modified to avoid spilling out secret that would be great.

## Actual Behavior
Example log: "+ temporal-sql-tool --ep cadence-db.service.consul -u cadence_user --pw XXXXXXXXXXX create --db temporal_visibility". 

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. Download auto-setup docker image from docker hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/temporalio/auto-setup
  2. Use the docker hub image for deploying temporal cluster. 
  

## Specifications

  - Version:0.23.1 (Issue is likely to occur in previous versions as well)
  - Platform: Cadence / Temporal OS: Linux
title: MySQL Password is displayed in plain text in log file when Temporal cluster is bootstrapped
